about.title: About Us
about.text: MicroMyu is a forward-looking high-tech enterprise specializing in computer software and hardware, artificial intelligence, virtual reality (VR), augmented reality (AR), mixed reality (MR), the Internet of Things (IoT), and cloud computing. We are committed to providing global enterprises with cutting-edge digital solutions and intelligent services.

solutions.title: Core Solutions ‚Äî Driving Business Transformation Through Technology
solutions.subtitle: MicroMyu deeply integrates AI, XR, and IoT with cloud computing to create scalable, customizable intelligent platforms and products. We help enterprises achieve operational intelligence, immersive experiences, and data-driven decision-making. We focus on results ‚Äî reducing costs, improving efficiency, and creating new business models.
solutions.description1: End-to-end enterprise-grade AI capabilities: customized model training, real-time inference, automated data labeling, and model governance. Applicable to various scenarios such as supply chain forecasting, intelligent customer service, and visual quality inspection. Supports both on-premise and hybrid cloud deployments, balancing performance and compliance.
solutions.description2: Immersive interaction and digital twin: AR guidance, VR training, mixed-reality maintenance, and visualized digital twin platforms. Designed for product design, remote collaboration, and realistic simulation through scalable XR modules.
solutions.description3: A complete chain from sensors to edge computing: customized sensor integration, edge gateway development, low-power connectivity, and cloud-based device management. Enables real-time data collection, intelligent edge alerts, and remote maintenance.
solutions.description4: Building secure, elastic, and scalable cloud-native platforms: microservices, containerization, CI/CD, and multi-cloud orchestration. We provide fast delivery pipelines, data lakes, and governance strategies to help enterprises achieve flexibility and cost optimization without added complexity.
solutions.description5: Rapid customization: requirement evaluation ‚Üí prototype ‚Üí co-iteration ‚Üí deployment and operations. MicroMyu delivers seamless integration across software customization, smart hardware design, and system implementation, ensuring every step from PoC to mass production is controllable and measurable.

industry.title: Industry Solutions
industry.subtitle: MyuTech brings cutting-edge technologies into key industries to enhance efficiency, user experience, and sustainable growth. Every implementation is scenario-driven, integrating AI, XR, IoT, and cloud computing to deliver measurable business impact.
industry.description1: By integrating Artificial Intelligence, XR (Extended Reality), and Big Data analytics, MyuTech enables destinations, hotels, and tourism enterprises with intelligent tour guides, visitor flow forecasting, and multilingual interactive services. Through real-time sensing and personalized recommendations, travelers enjoy an immersive digital experience that empowers the tourism industry to achieve smarter operations and sustainable growth.
industry.description2: In the fields of smart transportation, energy management, and public safety, MyuTech deploys cloud-based sensing networks and multimodal data fusion engines to achieve traffic congestion prediction, energy optimization, and rapid incident response.
industry.description3: By integrating AI image analysis, wearable IoT devices, and XR remote collaboration, MyuTech provides medical institutions with rapid screening, remote consultation, and rehabilitation training solutions that improve diagnostic efficiency and reduce medical costs.
industry.description4: Leveraging Industrial IoT and edge AI, MyuTech builds real-time digital twins and predictive maintenance platforms for manufacturing enterprises, reducing unplanned downtime by over 40% and increasing production efficiency by 30%.
industry.description5: For energy enterprises, MyuTech provides distributed energy management and load forecasting solutions that combine IoT sensing and cloud optimization algorithms to enable precise scheduling and visualized carbon reduction reporting.
industry.description6: Scenario-Driven: We design practical technology pathways based on real business challenges. Scalability: Modular architecture that adapts to organizations of any size or complexity. Measurable Outcomes: Transparent delivery aligned with key KPIs and data-driven performance.

MicroMyu is dedicated to seamlessly integrating AI, XR, IoT, and cloud capabilities to build scalable, low-energy, and auditable intelligent systems that enable enterprises to make efficient decisions and achieve sustainable growth.

vision.description2: Through standardized interfaces, transparent algorithms, and industry collaboration, we empower partners and developers to accelerate digital transformation across vertical industries.
vision.description3: We translate technological value into long-term social benefits, creating quantifiable outcomes in both business growth and environmental sustainability.
